p: This literature search was performed using specialized databases (ScienceDirect and SciFinder) using different combinations of the following keywords: “Cyclodextrins”, “Cyclodextrins in vivo” and “Cyclodextrins in vitro”. The inclusion criteria used were: both in vitro and in vivo studies that investigated biological action and the use of CDs to improve the biological performance of complexed substances. Figure 2 shows the in vivo biological activities of the substances complexed with CDs.
